text: 1975 AFC Women's Championship was held in Hong Kong from 25 August to 3 September. ==Results== ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 2 2 0 0 6 2 +4 4 align=left 2 1 0 1 5 3 +2 2 align=left 2 0 0 2 0 6 -6 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 2 2 0 0 5 0 +5 4 align=left 2 1 0 1 2 3 -1 2 align=left 2 0 0 2 0 4 -4 0 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round4-with third | 31 August | | 3 | | 2 | 31 August | | 3 | | 0 | 2 September | | 3 | | 1 | 2 September | | 5 | | 0 }} ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:AFC Women's Asian Cup tournaments Category:1975 in Asian sports Category:20th century in China Category:Football in Hong Kong Category:1975 in association football
title: 1975 AFC Women's Championship
